means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 梅克皮斯绰号，和事佬，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“促成+和平”(to make+peace)

sentence.Network_en: There is a skeleton in every house. ( William Makepeace Thackeray, Bdritish novelist )
sentence.Network_cn: 家家都有一本难念的经. ( 英国小说家萨克雷 )

sentence.Network_en: This stunning and provocative period tale is adapted from the classic novel by William Makepeace Thackeray.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国小说家萨克莱传世钜作[浮华世界]改编.

sentence.Network_en: Leslie Stephen's first wife had been the daughter of the novelist William Makepeace Thackeray.
sentence.Network_cn: 莱斯利.斯蒂芬的第一任妻子是小说家威廉斯.萨克雷的女儿.
